about_the_game:
Get ready for an exciting world of vibrant colors, high speeds, and unexpected twists in Hot & Lewd: Miami.
In this dynamic visual novel, you will meet the main character, a young guy who just graduated from the police academy but chose a life of wild parties and extreme street races over serving as an officer.

His carefree life takes a sharp turn when the police catch him red-handed during a race.
The situation seems hopeless, but thanks to his father's connections, a retired esteemed police officer, the main character gets a second chance: either go to prison or join the police force as a detective. The choice is obvious.
Now he is a Miami police detective, and his partner is a charming and serious girl who has just started her service.
She is the complete opposite of the main character, and their relationship becomes a key element of the story.

Players are offered a choice of two cases that will affect the development of the plot.
Will our hero manage to leave his past behind and become a true defender of the law?
The answer to this question depends solely on you.

Hot & Lewd: Miami combines an engaging storyline, colorful characters, and the atmosphere of Miami's nightlife. The game contains adult content, making it suitable only for an adult audience. Prepare for an incredible journey into a world where every decision matters, and every step can change everything.

Features:
  • Intuitive User Interface: Enjoy a user-friendly interface designed for seamless navigation and accessibility, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience for players of all skill levels.
  • Branching Storylines: Make crucial decisions that shape the narrative and lead to multiple endings, offering high replay value and a personalized gaming experience.
  • Engaging Characters: Form relationships with a cast of unique characters, each with their own backstory and role in your journey.
  • Animated 3D Sexual Experience: Your choices allow you to unlock the most magical sexual scenes with each of the characters.
  • Immerse yourself in real-time 3D characters and animations.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that may not be appropriate for all ages or for viewing at work. Specifically, it includes depictions of sexual acts, revealing outfits, nudity, sex animations, masturbation  all of which are portrayed graphically. These elements are integral to the storyline and character development within the game, contributing to the overall narrative experience. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.
